text: The Guinea Pig is a 1948 British drama movie directed by Roy Boulting and was based on the 1946 play of the same name by Warren Chetham-Strode. It stars Richard Attenborough, Sheila Sims, Bernard Miles, Cecil Trouncer, Robert Flemyng, Edith Sharpe, Joan Hickson, Anthony Newley, Oscar Quitak. ==Other websites== * * Category:1948 drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Roy Boulting Category:Movies set in schools
title: The Guinea Pig (movie)
